articles.author: Todd Richmond, Obed Lamy
articles.title: Indiana homeowner charged in fatal shooting of house cleaner who showed up at the wrong door - AP News
articles.description: Prosecutors have filed a voluntary manslaughter charge against an Indiana homeowner accused of killing a house cleaner after she showed up at a house by mistake. Curt Andersen could face up to 10 to 30 years in prison if he’s convicted. Officers found Maria F…
articles.content: LEBANON, Ind. (AP) An Indiana homeowner accused of killing a house cleaner who mistakenly arrived at his front door was charged with voluntary manslaughter on Monday in a case that could test the lim… [+5989 chars]
